diff_hunk:
@@ -234,6 +234,20 @@ def test_get_default_group(self):
         default_grp = dist.get_default_group()
         self.assertNotEqual(default_grp, None)
 
+    def test_get_backend(self):
+        if dist.get_world_size() > 2:
+            group = [1, 2]
+        else:
+            group = [0, 1]
+        group_id = dist.new_group(group)
+        backend_val = dist.DistBackend.parse(BACKEND)
+        self.assertEqual(dist.get_backend(), backend_val)
+        if dist.get_rank() in group:
+            self.assertEqual(dist.get_backend(group_id), backend_val)
+        else:
+            with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "Invalid process group specified"):
+                dist.get_backend(group_id)
body: Must have something to do with MPI group support. I believe this was a challenge for @teng-li so I wouldn't be surprised if there is something related going on here. Looking...
